creator: paulsp@apache.org
text:
MonitorResults does not write results n CSV format when "Save as XML" is
unchecked in the "Sample Results Save Configuration" window.

Below is an except from the file.

<monitorStats>
  <stringProp name="stats.cpuload">0</stringProp>
  <stringProp name="stats.load">19</stringProp>
  <stringProp name="stats.health">3</stringProp>
  <stringProp name="stats.host">foo.com</stringProp>
  <stringProp name="stats.threadload">10</stringProp>
  <stringProp name="stats.timestamp">1122478618179</stringProp>
  <stringProp name="stats.port">-1</stringProp>
  <stringProp name="stats.memload">28</stringProp>
  <stringProp name="stats.protocol">http</stringProp>
</monitorStats>
1122478618169,3706,foo.com status,200,OK,Monitor Group 1-1,text,true


Notice:
1) The monitorStats are in XML format and their is a line in CSV format.
2) The line is CSV format in not expected.  Might be a different bug.

creator: benoit.wiart@gmail.com
text: this bug is 10 years old and should be closed as wontfix

I am not sure MonitorResults is still used as there are more up to date and better options for monitoring.
Closing as WONTFIX.
creator: p.mouawad@ubik-ingenierie.com
